name: Blight (itch) (Objectif 3D)
description:
The Pitch: J.McKwit, technical maintenance officer in the military mining complex AK, is called by his angry boss. The secret artefact studied by the military: the Alkamia crystal, has become unstable. The base is evacuated and McKwit must solve the problem with its polarized gloves.

Gameplay: The gameplay is simple. Thanks to your polarized gloves you can grab the walls or push yourself to be thrown in the air. Levels are a mix of puzzles and courses for twenty minutes of play.

Graphics: We will find a certain Portal influence in Blight, where the simple rubs the effective. Designed on UE4, the game has a graphic chart based on pure science fiction. Technically clean (signs and feedbacks well built, bug free, learning curve and well mastered difficulties), the game runs with ease and fun!
